name: interactive_shell
description:
A wrapper library supporting linux bash shell, windows cmd and powershell and other shells with just one wrapper. Interactive and non interactive mode support.

I've made it to refactor big amount of files which have been many times copy-pasted and than modified.
author: Yuri Yaryshev

scripts.build:cjs: npm run clean:cjs && babel src --config-file ./babel.cjs.config.cjs --out-dir lib/cjs --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps
scripts.watch:cjs: npm run clean:cjs && title interactive_shell - watch:cjs & babel src --config-file ./babel.cjs.config.cjs --out-dir lib/cjs --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps -w
scripts.build:esm: npm run clean:esm && babel src --config-file ./babel.esm.config.cjs --out-dir lib/esm --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps
scripts.watch:esm: npm run clean:esm && babel src --config-file ./babel.esm.config.cjs --out-dir lib/esm --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps -w
scripts.watch:types: npm run clean:types && title interactive_shell - watch:types & tsc -p tsconfig-declarations.json -w
scripts.build:docs: api-extractor run --local && api-documenter markdown --input-folder temp --output-folder docs
scripts.build_lite: npm run precompile && npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types
scripts.build: npm run precompile_full && npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.republish: yb check-snapshot && npm run build && npx version-select && yb genprojmeta && yb dir_hash && npm publish && yb commit-tag-push
scripts.republish_forced: npm run build_lite && npx version-select && yb genprojmeta && npm publish
scripts.deps: echo Finding loops in .js requires... & del deps.png & madge dist -c -i deps.png && deps.png
scripts.deps_all: echo Generating full .js requires tree... & del deps.png & madge dist -i deps.png && deps.png
scripts.deps_orphans: echo Finding orphans .js requires... & del deps.png & madge dist --orphans -i deps.png && deps.png
